<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ankle Bite](/Feats.aspx?ID=1002) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Fang Sharpener](/Feats.aspx?ID=1000) or [Razortooth Goblin](/Heritages.aspx?ID=18) heritage

**Trigger**
A foe gives you the [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) condition using a part of its body.

</column>

---

Whenever someone grabs onto you, you instinctively bite down hard. Sometimes that makes them let go, and sometimes it just makes them angrier, but either way, it’s both satisfying and tasty. Make a jaws Strike against the triggering foe. On a critical hit, you are no longer grabbed. This Strike doesn’t count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn’t apply to this Strike.
name: Ankle Bite
prerequisite: Fang Sharpener or Razortooth Goblin heritage
